solution_line_template: She was left with {initial_bags} - {given_away}= <<{initial_bags}-{given_away}={remaining_after_giving}>>{remaining_after_giving} bag of chocolate after she gave {given_away} bags to her brother and sisters.

Therefore, the total number of bags of chocolates left after buying another {bought_again} is {remaining_after_giving} + {bought_again}= <<{remaining_after_giving}+{bought_again}={total_bags_left}>>{total_bags_left}.
